footer.description: Home for FTI Universitas Merdeka Malang students to grow, innovate, and thrive in the tech world.

hero.subtitle: Together with us, building innovation in the world of technology.

about.title: About Indevpro
about.description: INDEVPRO is an organization under the auspices of the Faculty of Information Technology, Merdeka University of Malang as a forum for students to develop their interests, creativity, and abilities in the field of technology.

teams.title: Our Teams
teams.description: From a simple idea to an extraordinary creation.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are always open to receive your questions, feedback, or suggestions, and our team will be happy to respond promptly.

activities.title: Latest Activities
activities.description: Through INDEVPRO, we carry out various productive activities such as competitions, collaborative learning sessions, and other creative programs to support the potential and innovation of the younger generation.
